about.title: Acerca de
about.text: El sÃ¡bado 14 de marzo de 2026 comenzarÃ¡ la primera ediciÃ³n de la Backyard Ultra Terrassa. La BYUT nace con la idea de contribuir solidariamente a la comunidad Backyard. Gracias al fantÃ¡stico terreno de Terrassa, el circuito incluye un desnivel medio y zonas sombreadas cerca del arroyo de la Betzuca ("Torrent de la Batzuca").

about.title: About
about.text: On Saturday March 14th 2026, the first edition of the Backyard Ultra Terrassa will start. Backyard Ultra Terrassa was born from the idea to contribute to charity and the Backyard community. Thanks to the fantastic terrain around the city of Terrassa, this course includes mid elevation gain and a shadowy terrain close to the Batzuca creek "Torrent de la Batzuca".
about.linkPrefix: Learn more on the official Backyard Ultra page:

format.title: Rules
points: We use the official rules from www.bigsbackyardultra,com, every hour on the hour â° you start a 6.7 km loop.
Youâ€™ve got 60:00 to finish. Arrive early? Rest. Arrive late? DNF.
No time banking ğŸ’³ â€” unused minutes donâ€™t carry over.
Be inside the start corral at the bell ğŸ””. Not there at the start = DNF.
No pacers, no external aid on course. Crew/aid only in the corral ğŸ¥¤.
Last One Standing wins ğŸ†; everyone else is officially a DNF (by design!).
Strategy matters: eat, drink, change layers, charge lights ğŸ”‹ â€” repeat.
Course is marked; bring lights for night laps ğŸŒ™ and a smile for sunrise ğŸŒ….
You canâ€™t do more loops than Oriol AntolÃ­ ğŸ˜‰ (103-loop Spanish record and BYUT co-organizer!).

location.title: Location
location.text: Terrassa (Barcelona). Exact venue and logistics to be announced.
